executable.title: Models
executable.description: This module is used for changing the appearance of and organizing 3d surface models.
executable.contributor: Alex Yarmarkovich, Isomics, SPL (Nicole Aucoin, BWH)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

parameters.label: Scene
parameters.description: The tree view of all models and model hierarchies in the current MRML scene.

parameter.label: Surface Area
parameter.description: The calculated surface area of the model, in square millimetres

parameter.label: Volume Area
parameter.description: The volume inside the surface model

parameters.label: Display
parameters.description: Control the display properties of the currently selected model in the Scene

parameter.label: Visible
parameter.description: Is this surface model visible in the 3D view?

parameters.label: Material Properties
parameters.description: Material properties of the currently selected model

parameter.label: Color
parameter.description: The RGBA color of this model

parameters.label: Clipping
parameters.description: Control the clipping properties for this surface model

string-enumeration.label: Clipping Type
string-enumeration.description: Control the clipping type, where the slice planes intersect the model

string-enumeration.label: Red Slice Clipping
string-enumeration.description: Control on which side of the red slice plane is clipped on the model

string-enumeration.label: Yellow Slice Clipping
string-enumeration.description: Control on which side of the yellow slice plane is clipped on the model

string-enumeration.label: Green Slice Clipping
string-enumeration.description: Control on which side of the green slice plane is clipped on the model
